author: VANESSA GERA and ADAM PEMBLE
title: Fleeing to the border: Some 120,000 Ukrainians seek refuge
description: MEDYKA, Poland (AP) — Dragging suitcases and carrying children, tens of thousands of Ukrainians rushed to the borders Saturday as invading Russian troops pressed their advance into Ukraine, moving toward the country's capital of Kyiv.
